code: function lookup(method,endpoint,callback,data){var jsonData;if(data){jsonData=JSON.stringify(data);}var xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();var url="http://localhost:8000/api".concat(endpoint);xhr.responseType="json";xhr.open(method,url);xhr.onload=function(){callback(xhr.response,xhr.status);};xhr.onerror=function(e){console.log(e);callback({message:"the request was an error"},400);};xhr.send(jsonData);}export function loadTweets(callback){lookup("GET","/tweets/",callback);}
